attributes.action: Improve southern train service. It is currently a disgrace.
attributes.additional_details: I have only been traveling on southern rail for one month. Every day one of my journeys has been disrupted if not a little, majorly. It is a disgrace, that is expensive. It needs to be looked  at its as if everyone has given up. It puts unnecessary strains on people's lives, those customers on the train, and even the operators on board the train who are the front line of so much anger.
